===Noun===

# a [[tablet]] with the [[name]] of an [[ancestor]] [[inscribed]] on it; [[w:spirit tablet|spirit tablet]]

[[Image:Memorial Tablet for Spirits in Pingtung County Taiwan.JPG|300px|thumb|right|神位]]

===Usage notes===
The tablet is usually placed in an [[ancestral]] [[hall]] so that [[offering]]s ([[food]], [[incense]] etc.) can be [[placed]] on an [[alter]] in [[front]] of it.
